scripts.install:rust: curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh -s -- -y && export PATH="$HOME/.cargo/bin:$PATH" && rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo install wasm-pack --locked
scripts.build:wasm: if [ -f "src/infrastructure/wasm/pkg/spectrogram_wasm.d.ts" ] && [ -f "src/infrastructure/wasm/pkg/spectrogram_wasm.js" ] && [ -f "src/infrastructure/wasm/pkg/spectrogram_wasm_bg.wasm" ]; then echo 'WASM files already exist, skipping build...'; else command -v wasm-pack >/dev/null 2>&1 || (echo 'Installing Rust and wasm-pack...' && npm run install:rust || { echo 'Error: Failed to install wasm-pack. Please install it manually with: cargo install wasm-pack'; exit 1; }) && export PATH="$HOME/.cargo/bin:$PATH" && cd wasm && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir ../src/infrastructure/wasm/pkg; fi
